title: Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag – Jackdaw Edition
body:
Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag – Jackdaw Edition


Genres/Tags: Action, Open world, Stealth, Pirate/Privateer, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Ubisoft Montreal / Ubisoft Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI15
Original Size: 29.2 GB
Repack Size: from 4.9 GB GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by KieranDon, compatible with torrent) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Assassins.Creed.IV.Black.Flag-RELOADED ISO release: rld-ac4bf.iso (24,835,420,160 bytes)
  • Assassins.Creed.IV.Black.Flag.Freedom.Cry-RELOADED (rld-a4fc.iso, 4,244,289,536 bytes) and ACIVBF_Update_v1.07_HF_AiO_With_DLC_for_RELOADED-CS (2,288,364,682 bytes) applied over
  • 3DM crack included and all DLCs activated; “LowSync Save” by machine4578 can be found in game folder after installation – it unlocks Uplay Awards via save game trick
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of multiplayer files (cause you can’t play MP in cracked version anyway) and voicever packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 29.2 to 4.9~8.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 15-35 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 27 GB
  • Game language can be changed in game settings: GUI, subtitles and voiceovers separately
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • “Avelin” and “Freedom Cry” campaigns will be activated after you start main campaign, quit the game and re-run it again
  • To activate Uplay Awards, after first game run/save, copy “2.save” from “LowSync Save” to “save3dmgames” folder
  • To enable four cheat DLCs (Resource Pack, etc.) open “saves.ini” in “save3dmgames” folder and change “false” params to “true” ones

Game Description

The year is 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean and have established their own lawless Republic where corruption, greediness and cruelty are commonplace.

Among these outlaws is a brash young captain named Edward Kenway. His fight for glory has earned him the respect of legends like Blackbeard, but also drawn him into the ancient war between Assassins and Templars, a war that may destroy everything the pirates have built.

Welcome to the Golden Age of Piracy.

You can skip downloading of voice packs you don’t need and multiplayer files you can’t use anyway. Here is the list of selective/optional files.

  • fg-optional-multiplayer.bin (download and install only if you need to import this repack to your legit Steam/Uplay installation)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective/optional” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-05).
